__e: Honestly, I'm suspicious of everyone these days.
No, but... ls there some reason you're suspicious of my son in particular?
You do get the feeling that he's going... that Jack's going to be doing his work, because he seems a little, like, leery of Jack.
Because he's a fucking drug-dealer and he's suspicious... and he doesn't meet you unless he's met you there before.
Were you always this suspicious and paranoid, and I just missed it?
And then these amazing new neighbors move in and with me feeling so vulnerable, it's only natural that I would get suspicious and find fault with them.
